org.jboss.msc.service

Interface ServiceRegistry


  • public interface ServiceRegistry
    A service registry.
    Author:
    David M. Lloyd, Flavia Rainone, Richard Opalka

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void disable(Transaction transaction)
      Disables this registry and all its services, causing UP services to stop.
      void enable(Transaction transaction)
      Enables this registry.
      ServiceController getRequiredService(ServiceName serviceName)
      Gets a service controller, throwing an exception if it is not found.
      ServiceController getService(ServiceName serviceName)
      Gets a service controller, returning null if it is not found.
      void remove(Transaction transaction)
      Removes this registry from the container.

    • Method Detail

      • getRequiredService

        ServiceController getRequiredService(ServiceName serviceName)
                                     throws ServiceNotFoundException
        Gets a service controller, throwing an exception if it is not found.
        Parameters:
        serviceName - the service name
        Returns:
        the service controller corresponding to serviceName
        Throws:
        ServiceNotFoundException - if the service is not present in the registry

      • getService

        ServiceController getService(ServiceName serviceName)
        Gets a service controller, returning null if it is not found.
        Parameters:
        serviceName - the service name
        Returns:
        the service controller corresponding to serviceName, or null if it is not found

      • disable

        void disable(Transaction transaction)
             throws IllegalStateException,
                    IllegalArgumentException,
                    InvalidTransactionStateException
        Disables this registry and all its services, causing UP services to stop.
        Parameters:
        transaction - the transaction
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if transaction is null or if transaction controller associated with transaction is not the same as the one associated with this service registry.
        InvalidTransactionStateException - if transaction is not active.
        IllegalStateException - if registry have been removed.

      • enable

        void enable(Transaction transaction)
            throws IllegalStateException,
                   IllegalArgumentException,
                   InvalidTransactionStateException
        Enables this registry. As a result, its services may start, depending on their mode rules.

        Registries are enabled by default.

        Parameters:
        transaction - the transaction
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if transaction is null or if transaction controller associated with transaction is not the same as the one associated with this service registry.
        InvalidTransactionStateException - if transaction is not active.
        IllegalStateException - if registry have been removed.

      • remove

        void remove(Transaction transaction)
            throws IllegalArgumentException,
                   InvalidTransactionStateException
        Removes this registry from the container.
        Parameters:
        transaction - the transaction
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if transaction is null or if transaction controller associated with transaction is not the same as the one associated with this service registry.
        InvalidTransactionStateException - if transaction is not active.
